location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions 300 x 250mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the Middle East indicating by coloured shading the areas of oil concessions held by different oil companies. It also shows oil pipelines and oil fields are underlined in red ink. A key relates the colour shaded areas to the various oil companies and their concessions.The map bears the statement 'RESEARCH DEPT F.O. OCTOBER, 1946'.
